name: Dwarves
description:
The '''Dwarves''' are an American [[punk rock]] band formed in [[Chicago, Illinois]] and based in [[San Francisco]], [[California]] as of 2009.

Formed as a [[garage punk (fusion genre)|garage punk]] band under the name Suburban Nightmare, their career subsequently saw them move in a [[hardcore punk|hardcore]] direction before settling into an eclectic punk rock sound emphasizing intentionally shocking lyrics. They have been described as "one of the last true bastions of punk rock ideology in the contemporary musical age".
